name: Orpheus (Made From Polygons)
description:
Orpheus is the tragic tale of the legendary poet who travelled to Hades to retrieve his kidnapped love. Enter the underworld and try your best at finding Eurydice but beware of creatures that reside there. They will do anything to get you stuck in a loop and stop you from ever finding your Eurydice in this action roguelite adventure set within greek mythology.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Left click - Throw javelin at location
Right click - Dodge

Karolinas first time doing pixel art!
